TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi sealed beforefieldinit MemoryFailPoint extends System.Runtime.ConstrainedExecution.CriticalFinalizerObject implements class System.IDisposable
Public NotInheritable Class MemoryFailPoint Inherits CriticalFinalizerObject Implements IDisposable
public ref class MemoryFailPoint sealed : System::Runtime::ConstrainedExecution::CriticalFinalizerObject, IDisposable
type MemoryFailPoint = class inherit CriticalFinalizerObject interface IDisposable

summary.span: 执行一个操作之前检查是否有足够的内存资源。

span.span: Checks for sufficient memory resources before executing an operation.

remarks.format: ## Remarks > [!NOTE] > 此类用于高级开发。This class is intended for use in advanced development. 创建类的实例将创建内存入口。Creating an instance of the class creates a memory gate. 内存入口在启动需要大量内存的活动之前检查是否有足够的资源。A memory gate checks for sufficient resources before initiating an activity that requires a large amount of memory. 如果检查失败, 将导致引发异常。Failing the check results in an exception being thrown. 此例外会阻止操作启动, 并降低因资源不足而失败的可能性。This exception prevents an operation from being started and reduces the possibility of failure due to lack of resources. 这使您可以降低性能以避免异常, 并避免在代码中的任意位置不正确地处理异常导致的任何状态损坏。This enables you decrease performance to avoid an exception and any state corruption that may result from improper handling of the exception in arbitrary locations in your code. > [!IMPORTANT] > 此类型实现 接口。This type implements the interface. 在使用完类型后，您应直接或间接释放类型。When you have finished using the type, you should dispose of it either directly or indirectly. 若要直接释放类型，请在 `try`/`catch` 块中调用其 方法。To dispose of the type directly, call its method in a `try`/`catch` block. 若要间接释放类型，请使用 `using`（在 C# 中）或 `Using`（在 Visual Basic 中）等语言构造。To dispose of it indirectly, use a language construct such as `using` (in C#) or `Using` (in Visual Basic). 有关详细信息，请参阅 接口主题中的“使用实现 IDisposable 的对象”一节。For more information, see the "Using an Object that Implements IDisposable" section in the interface topic. 通过引发异常, 应用程序可以区分某个操作将无法完成的估计值和可能已损坏应用程序状态的部分完成操作。By throwing an exception, an application can distinguish between an estimate that an operation will not be able to complete and a partially completed operation that may have corrupted the application state. 这使应用程序可以降低悲观升级策略的频率, 这可能需要卸载当前的或回收该过程。This allows an application to reduce the frequency of a pessimistic escalation policy, which may require unloading the current or recycling the process. 检查所有垃圾回收堆中是否有足够的内存和连续的虚拟地址空间, 并且可能会增加交换文件的大小。 checks to see whether sufficient memory and consecutive virtual address space are available in all garbage collection heaps, and may increase the size of the swap file. 不保证在入口生存期内内存的长期可用性, 但调用方应始终使用方法来确保释放与关联的资源。 makes no guarantees regarding the long-term availability of the memory during the lifetime of the gate, but callers should always use the method to ensure that resources associated with are released. 若要使用内存入口, 必须创建对象并指定下一操作应使用的内存量 (mb)。To use a memory gate, you must create a object and specify the number of megabytes (MB) of memory that the next operation is expected to use. 如果没有足够的内存可用, 则会引发异常。If enough memory is not available, an exception is thrown. 构造函数的参数必须是一个正整数。The parameter of the constructor must be a positive integer. 负值会引发异常。A negative value raises an exception. 以 16 MB 的粒度运行。 operates at a granularity of 16 MB. 小于 16 MB 的任何值将被视为 16 MB, 其他值将被视为 16 MB 的下一个最大值。Any values smaller than 16 MB are treated as 16 MB, and other values are treated as the next largest multiple of 16 MB. ## Examples 使应用程序能够缓慢地运行, 以避免因损坏而导致内存不足。 enables an application to slow itself to avoid running out of memory in a corrupting manner. 它应在词法范围内使用。It should be used within a lexical scope. 下面的示例启动线程以处理工作队列中的项。The following example launches threads to process items in a work queue. 在启动每个线程之前, 将使用检查可用内存资源。Before each thread is launched, the available memory resources are checked using . 如果引发了异常, 则在启动下一个线程之前, main 方法会一直等待, 直到有可用的内存。If an exception is thrown, the main method waits until memory is available before launching the next thread. [!code-csharp[MemoryFailPoint#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR/MemoryFailPoint/CS/program.cs#1)]

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig specialname rtspecialname instance void .ctor(int32 sizeInMegabytes) cil managed

param.name: sizeInMegabytes
param.span: 需要的内存大小（以兆字节为单位）。

span.span: The required memory size, in megabytes.
This must be a positive value.

summary.span: 初始化 类的新实例，指定成功执行所需的内存量。

span.span: Initializes a new instance of the class, specifying the amount of memory required for successful execution.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 应用程序处理工作项所用的内存量可以确定凭经验。The amount of memory used by your application to process a work item can be determined empirically. 若要估计应用程序处理请求所需的内存量, 请考虑使用方法来确定调用处理工作项的方法之前和之后可用的内存量。To estimate the amount of memory your application needs to process a request, consider using the method to determine the amount of memory available before and after calling the method that processes the work item. 有关动态确定`sizeInMegabytes`参数值的代码示例, 请参阅类。See the class for a code example that dynamically determines the value for the `sizeInMegabytes` parameter. ## Examples 下面的示例演示如何在执行时确定方法所需的内存量。The following example demonstrates how to determine the amount of memory a method requires when executing. 此代码示例是为类提供的更大示例的一部分。This code example is part of a larger example provided for the class. [!code-csharp[MemoryFailPoint#2](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR/MemoryFailPoint/CS/program.cs#2)]

exception.span: 指定的内存大小为负数。

span.span: The specified memory size is negative.

exception.span: 没有足够的内存来开始执行由门保护的代码。

span.span: There is insufficient memory to begin execution of the code protected by the gate.

permission.span: 需要对直接调用方的完全信任。

span.span: requires full trust for the immediate caller.

permission.span: 部分受信任的或透明的代码不能使用此成员。

span.span: This member cannot be used by partially trusted or transparent code.

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig newslot virtual instance void Dispose() cil managed
abstract member Dispose : unit -> unit override this.Dispose : unit -> unit

summary.span: 释放由 使用的所有资源。

span.span: Releases all resources used by the .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 在完成使用 后，应调用 。Call when you are finished using the . 方法使 处于不可用状态。The method leaves the in an unusable state. 调用后, 必须释放对的所有引用, 以便垃圾回收器能够回收占用的内存。After calling , you must release all references to the so the garbage collector can reclaim the memory that the was occupying. 有关详细信息, 请参阅[清理非托管资源](~/docs/standard/garbage-collection/unmanaged.md)和[实现 Dispose 方法](~/docs/standard/garbage-collection/implementing-dispose.md)。For more information, see [Cleaning Up Unmanaged Resources](~/docs/standard/garbage-collection/unmanaged.md) and [Implementing a Dispose Method](~/docs/standard/garbage-collection/implementing-dispose.md). > [!NOTE] > 每次释放对 的最后一个引用前，均应调用 。Always call before you release your last reference to the . 否则，在垃圾回收器调用 对象的 `Finalize` 方法之前，该对象正在使用的资源不会被释放。Otherwise, the resources it is using will not be freed until the garbage collector calls the object's `Finalize` method.

MemberSignature.Value: .method familyhidebysig virtual instance void Finalize() cil managed

summary.span: 确保垃圾回收器回收 对象时释放资源并执行其他清理操作。

span.span: Ensures that resources are freed and other cleanup operations are performed when the garbage collector reclaims the object.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 当当前对象准备好完成时, 垃圾回收器将调用方法。The garbage collector calls the method when the current object is ready to be finalized.
